info.description: API documentation for Nami Transaction Tracking System.
info.title: Nami Backend API

get.description: Get daily FX rates for a period
Fetch today's FX rate for a currency pair, cache it, and return
get.summary: Get today's FX rate (fetched and stored)

get.description: Retrieve investments based on filter criteria
Retrieve open investments available for stake operations

post.description: Process a stake transaction and create/update investment
Process an unstake transaction and update investment. The field `investment_id` is required and must reference an existing open investment.

get.description: Retrieve a specific investment by ID
Get daily prices for a symbol or asset ID in a currency
Get list of outstanding borrows as of a date
Get cash flow over a period
Project remaining principal and interest for active borrows as of a date
Get current holdings as of a date with portfolio percentages
Get aggregated holdings summary as of a date with portfolio percentages
Get profit and loss over a period
Get a list of transactions or create a new one

post.description: Get a list of transactions or create a new one

get.description: Operate on a single transaction by ID
get.summary: Get, update, or delete a transaction

put.description: Operate on a single transaction by ID
put.summary: Get, update, or delete a transaction

delete.description: Operate on a single transaction by ID
delete.summary: Get, update, or delete a transaction

financing_in_usd.description: Financing totals include borrow (as inflow), repay_borrow and interest_expense (as outflows)

operating_in_usd.description: Operating totals exclude financing flows (borrow, repay_borrow, interest_expense)

investment_id.description: Enhanced investment tracking - links transaction to investment position
